channel.title: Rights on objects
channel.description:
Before i ask my question i would just like to say yes i am shit at coding on private servers now that i have said that hopefully people will not post useless spam on this thread. If you can not answer my question or provide any advice please do not post.
Anyway my question is how can i add rights to certain object. I want to make it so only people with a certain rights level can click on a object in this case a portal and be teleported. Any help will be greatly appreciated
